history.proof: intros n H. srun best use: codeArityLNTFIsCorrect2 unfold: LNN, LNT, Functions.

ctx: destruct n as [| n'] eqn: Hn.

ctx: destruct n as [| n'] eqn: Hn.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, n' : nat Hn : n = S n' H : switchPR (S n') (switchPR (Init.Nat.pred (S n')) (switchPR (Init.Nat.pred (Init.Nat.pred (S n'))) (switchPR (Init.Nat.pred (Init.Nat.pred (Init.Nat.pred (S n')))) 0 1) 2) 3) 3 <> 0 The term "inr Plus" has type "(?A + LNTFunction)%type" while it is expected to have type "Functions LNN".

original: intros n H. unfold codeArityLNTF in H. destruct n as [| n'] eqn: Hn. - intro. contradiction. - exists (inr Plus). reflexivity.
